_comment: This instructional template is designed for a top-tier consulting role. The AI will populate the fields that contain an '{Instruction: ...}' string.
summary: {Instruction: Write a powerful 2-3 sentence summary for a top-tier consulting role. Directly mirror the language and keywords from the job description and showcase a blend of the 4 key consulting traits: Problem-solving, Personal impact, Entrepreneurial drive, and Leadership. Keep it concise and under 50 words.}

work_experience._comment: For the most recent and relevant role, showcase a mix of all key traits.

description.instruction: {Instruction: Using the 'Accomplished [X] as measured by [Y] by doing [Z]' formula, rewrite the corresponding achievement from the base resume to highlight leadership and initiative in a business context. Quantify the result. Max 25 words.}

{Instruction: Using the 'Accomplished [X] as measured by [Y] by doing [Z]' formula, rewrite the corresponding achievement from the base resume to detail a complex analytical success (e.g., building a data model). Emphasize efficiency or accuracy gains. Max 25 words.}

{Instruction: Using the 'Accomplished [X] as measured by [Y] by doing [Z]' formula, rewrite the corresponding achievement from the base resume to focus on client-facing work where your insights directly influenced a senior stakeholder's decision. Max 25 words.}

work_experience._comment: For other roles, focus on 1-2 key traits that are most relevant.

description.instruction: {Instruction: Using the 'Accomplished [X] as measured by [Y] by doing [Z]' formula, rewrite the corresponding achievement from the base resume to highlight developing a complex, scalable framework that improved team performance. Max 25 words.}

{Instruction: Using the 'Accomplished [X] as measured by [Y] by doing [Z]' formula, rewrite the corresponding achievement from the base resume to describe a complex analysis you conducted that led to a strategic pivot or optimization for a client. Max 25 words.}

education.awards: {Instruction: Based on the base resume data, detail the competitive award, specifying the level of competition (e.g., 'Awarded for top 5% of class' or '1 of 500 applicants'). If none, replace this with a summary of relevant coursework.}

extracurricular_achievements._comment: This section is crucial for showing leadership and drive outside of work.
extracurricular_achievements.organization: {Instruction: From the base resume data, fill in the name of the extracurricular organization.}
extracurricular_achievements.role: {Instruction: From the base resume data, fill in the role held.}
extracurricular_achievements.date: {Instruction: From the base resume data, fill in the dates.}
description: {Instruction: Trait: Leadership & Entrepreneurial Drive. Using the 'Accomplished [X]...' formula, rewrite the description from the base resume to showcase leadership, initiative, or teamwork in a non-professional context. Quantify the impact (e.g., number of people led, funds raised).}

skills._comment: This section should be concise and easy for a recruiter to scan.
skills.technical: {Instruction: From the base resume data, list the most relevant technical skills. Prioritize skills mentioned in the job description. Example: Python (Pandas), SQL, Tableau.}
skills.languages: {Instruction: From the base resume data, list languages and proficiency levels. Example: English (Native), French (Fluent).}
skills.interests: {Instruction: From the base resume data, list 2-3 unique, specific interests that are good conversation starters and hint at positive traits (e.g., 'Competitive Marathon Runner' shows discipline). Avoid generic interests.}

personal_information._comment: This data will be merged from your base resume data file, not generated by the AI.
